title: Lag Issues after latest update
body:
I never really experienced lag. However, after the latest update, a lot of lag spikes start to appear out of no where.
As I said, I never experienced lag issues when I play this game, so I'm confident it's not my wireless internet that's the problem.

replies.body: I have the same issues man.

You could be suffering from network issues like packet loss, that can result in spikes that you mention.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) in those specific matches to see what's going on.  Let me know what you find!
